item.title: Sample Resource Post
item.description: Sample Resource Post This is a sample resource post that demonstrates how to add individual resource posts to your website. What you can include: Code examples: Share code snippets and complete scripts Tutorials: Step-by-step guides for various topics Data sets: Links to useful data sets for analysis Tools and software: Reviews and recommendations Research materials: Notes, papers, and other academic resources Example Code Block # Sample R code library(ggplot2) data <- data.
